snippet: Mr. Sasser, a chef whose romance with Pedro Zamora on MTV’s “The Real World” was among the first real-life gay relationships on television, helped publicize issues about AIDS.
abstract: Sean Sasser, AIDS activist whose same-sex romance on MTV show The Real World was among the first real-life gay relationships on television, dies at age 44.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sasser, a chef whose romance with Pedro Zamora on MTV’s “The Real World” was among the first real-life gay relationships on television, helped publicize issues about AIDS.

headline.main: Sean Sasser, Who Was Half of One of TV’s First Gay Couples, Dies at 44
headline.print_headline: Sean Sasser, 44; Was Half of One of TV’s First Gay Couples

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
